name: Judge Dredd
overview: Mega-City One is in ruins. Corruption is rampant. It's time to take the law into your own hands. Armed with explosive Lawgiver firepower -- heat seekers, ricochet rockets, incendiary missiles and more -- take on Mean Machine, the ABC Robot and other brutal barriers to justice. Take to the skies on your high speed Lawmaster motorcycle and pacify even the most persistent perps! You're no above the law. You are the law!!!
